name: cellist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a musician who plays the cello: He was principal cellist of the Atlanta Symphony Orchestra.
Lena Gadanski/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI loved music and I always wanted to be a cellist.The duo of cellist David Finckel and pianist Wu Han played Haydn and Prokofiev.Though he's spent much of his life on stage, virtuoso cellist Yo-Yo Ma still gets the jitters before he plays.The cellist draws her bow across the strings.
